Name: Fruit Hoop
About the game: Fruit are falling from the sky!! In Fruit Hoop catch fruit in a cute little hoop. Beat your old score by catching more and more fruit! The fruit are endless!! Planned Features: *Customize your hoop with credits earned! *Falling bombs!
